name: brake
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 a device that makes a vehicle go slower or stop, or a pedal, bar, or handle that makes this device work: She had no brakes on her bicycle. The driver suddenly put on his brakes.slam on the brakes informal I slammed on (= quickly used) the brakes, but it was too late.anti-lock brakes All our new models have anti-lock brakes. a screech of brakes (also a squeal of brakes)
the loud, unpleasant noise of a car suddenly stopping: Suddenly we heard a screech of brakes and saw the car swerve to miss the bicycle.
